about_the_game:
It’s not all about passengers out there – discover different freight traffic on the Midland Main Line and beyond with Skyhook Games’ Cargo Line for Train Sim World 4. In Volume 1, keep the country running with modern, VTG-branded TEA tankers, driving heavy fuel-laden services – a flammable challenge awaits.

Climb aboard Class 66 traction and get to work across the UK’s challenging oil and fuel industries. Featuring a brand-new modern variant of the TEA Tanker, complete with VTG branding, you will have the challenge of moving incredibly heavy trains across passenger main lines. Keep the wheelspin under control and always be several steps ahead, it’s no easy task stopping a missile on rails!

Despite the similar distinction, the variants of TEA Tanker used in the UK today differ from the ones built in the 1980s – modern, VTG-branded tankers have been steadily increasing use throughout the 21st Century, with new batches of wagons being delivered from 2001 and as recent as 2018.

Across a new selection of scenarios and timetable layers, take on the task of hauling oil and fuel across both the Midland Main Line and Great Western Express routes. Adding tanker trouble across the complex East Midlands network and weaving in-between existing freight and Turbo commuter duties in the outskirts of London.

With Train Sim World 4’s Free Roam, transfer the action into any route of your choosing, and put your fleet of locomotives to the test dragging long, laden lash-ups.

Experience the challenge of freight with Skyhook Games’ Cargo Line Vol.1 - Petroleum!

Key Features


  • Modern 100T TEA Tanker Wagon in multiple VTG-branded liveries
    • VTG Blue
    • VTG Green
    • VTG Red
    • VTG Dark Grey
    • VTG Light Grey
  • Class 66 locomotive in EWS livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • 2 additional Scenarios and a Timetable layer each for Midland Main Line and Great Western Express
  • Additional Journey Mode chapters for Midland Main Line and Great Western Express
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Explore the trains in Free Roam
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 270 MB
